attributes.action: ensure that all MPs, Ministers and Prime Ministers and Judges pension schemes are all subject to the same taxation rules as for private and public sector pensions scemes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is disgraceful that those who govern us and impose punitive taxation on the populace, ensure they themselves are not subject to the same rules and regulations. This is made worse by the fact they are paid by taxpayers.
